question: Lucas has 50 hectares of blueberry field. There are 82 blueberrys per hectare. Lucas can harvest his blueberrys every 4 months. How many blueberrys can Lucas harvest within a year?
answer:
Lucas has 82*50= <<82*50=4100>>4100 blueberrys on his field.
Lucas can harvest his blueberrys 12 / 4 = <<12/4=3>>3 times per year
Therefore Lucas can harvest 4100*3 = <<4100*3=12,300>>12,300 blueberrys per year.
#### 12,300
